item.railways.light_blue_incomplete_cond: 淡蓝色列车长帽（半成品）
item.railways.light_gray_incomplete_cond: 淡灰色列车长帽（半成品）

railways.ponder.conductor_constructing.t: 指挥机器人由安山机壳组成
railways.ponder.conductor_redstoning.hea: 借助指挥机器人远程操控红石元件
railways.ponder.conductor_redstoning.tex: 指挥机器人可以在玩家注视它时按下按钮
它同样可以在玩家注视它时拉动拉杆
当玩家戴着与其颜色不一致的列车长帽时，指挥机器人不会激活红石元件
railways.ponder.conductor_toolboxing.hea: 使用指挥机器人运输工具箱
railways.ponder.conductor_toolboxing.tex: 工具箱装备在指挥机器人身上时，其功能正常
railways.ponder.train_semaphore.header: 使用臂板信号机可视化信号状态
railways.ponder.train_semaphore.text_1: 将臂板信号机放置在列车信号机上方的杆上
railways.ponder.train_semaphore.text_2: 臂板信号机下方的支柱可由不同材料组成
railways.ponder.train_semaphore.text_3: 臂板信号机会实时显示支柱下信号机的信号状态
railways.ponder.train_semaphore.text_4: 如果黄铜信号区间有多个有效的出口路径……
railways.ponder.train_semaphore.text_5: ……可以将第二个臂板信号机放置在第一个的上方
railways.ponder.train_semaphore.text_6: 如果有任一可用信号区间被阻塞，底部的信号机将会关闭
railways.ponder.train_semaphore.text_7: 如果所有信号区间都被阻塞，顶部的信号机将会关闭
railways.ponder.train_semaphore.text_8: 当两个臂板信号机都放置在非黄铜信号机上时，它们会同时关闭
railways.tooltip.coupler.error.mode_not_: UNLOCALIZED: Action not permitted in current mode
railways.tooltip.coupler.error.missing_t: UNLOCALIZED: Requires both track points to be occupied
railways.tooltip.coupler.error.carriage_: UNLOCALIZED: Carriage(s) not aligned properly. Hint: The center of the bogey should be aligned over the coupler track point.
block.railways.track_coupler.tooltip.sum: UNLOCALIZED: Bind to a track under the _middle_ of a train's _front bogey_, then scroll on top with a wrench to extend the coupler under another train's _rear bogey_.
block.railways.track_coupler.tooltip.con: UNLOCALIZED: When the right carriages are over the track points, and the Coupler is in the right mode
block.railways.track_coupler.tooltip.beh: UNLOCALIZED: Providing a _redstone signal_ will _couple_ the two trains together.
block.railways.track_coupler.tooltip.con: UNLOCALIZED: When a different track targeting block (such as a Train Signal) is bound to the same track
block.railways.track_coupler.tooltip.beh: UNLOCALIZED: The coupler icon will _move_ to the side, and they will _coexist_.
block.create.track_station.tooltip.summa: UNLOCALIZED: A _deployer_ holding a _wrench_ can automatically assemble and disassemble trains by hitting a _station_. _Hint_: hoppers can be used to put a wrench in a deployer.
_: Thank you for translating Steam 'n Rails!
